# Novogradac 2022 Spring Renewable Energy and Environmental Tax Credits
Conference

#### May 19-20 | The Ritz-Carlton Denver and online

#### **It's an exciting time for renewable energy with potential growth on the
horizon**

Join top deal makers from around the country in Denver, Colorado, for
Novogradac’s two-day conference. With built-in networking breaks and an
exclusive reception for attendees, this is your chance to connect with leading
professionals within the renewable energy world.

Immerse yourself in discussions of the latest industry trends, emerging
technologies, tax credit equity pricing and financing strategies while taking
part in valuable professional development and networking sessions.

REGISTER

## Sponsorship Opportunities

For more information about becoming a sponsor, contact _Carol Hough_ ,
Sponsorship Director or _Christianna Cohen_, Sales Representative.

## Registration Rates

Early Bird rate ends Thursday, March 24, 2022.

Conference Rates by Type | Early Bird | Standard | Onsite  
---|---|---|---  
_**Online**_ |   |   |  
Attendee | $99 | $199 | $199  
Novogradac Client | $99 | $99 | $99  
_**In-Person**_ |   |   |  
Attendee | $725 | $775 | $850  
Novogradac Client | $675 | $675 | $675  
_**Add-ons**_ |   |   |  
Workshop only | $550 | $550 | $550  
Workshop with conference | $450 | $450 | $450  
Reception guest pass | $75 | $75 | $75  
  
Groups of three (3) or more will receive $100 off their in-person conference
registration. (Workshops not included).  
 _*All three attendees will need to register in a group to receive the
discount. The discount will automatically apply. No code needed._

Registration Rates

## Earn Continuing Education Credits

Novogradac will provide a certificate of completion for proof of continued
education (CE) for relevant re-certifications. To receive a certificate of
completion, please indicate your preference to earn CE during your
registration or with a staff at the event registration desk at the conference.

Novogradac & Company LLP is registered with the National Association of State
Boards of Accountancy (NASBA) as a sponsor of continuing professional
education on the National Registry of CPE Sponsors. State boards of
accountancy have final authority on the acceptance of individual courses for
CPE credit. To verify which sessions qualify for CPE credit please visit the
Agenda tab.

For those seeking CLE credits, Novogradac is not a CLE sponsor but can provide
eligible attendees a general certificate of attendance and, on request,
additional supporting materials for self-submission to state boards. Please
note that Novogradac cannot guarantee CLE credits will be accepted.
